text: Druie Douglas Barnard Jr. (March 20, 1922 â€“ January 11, 2018) was an American politician. He served as a member of the United States House of Representatives from Georgia's 10th congressional district from 1977 through 1993. He was born in Augusta, Georgia. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Barnard, Jr. died on January 11, 2018 in Augusta, Georgia of pneumonia at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:United States representatives from Georgia Category:People from Augusta, Georgia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Doug Barnard Jr.
